skillTree.localised_description: Create a nightmare of decay, and let the Plague Lord feast on the suffering and sickness that follows.

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

skillTree.localised_description: Thusly, the virulent maladies of the Crow are borne forth to repulse and infect its mortal foes; there lieth victory eternal.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 8%
Weapon strength: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: This fetid, disgusting pus is so repulsive to the untainted that it mimics traditional armour of far greater substance.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: "My bedfellows are pestilence, famine and warâ€¦ but mainly pestilence."

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: Feytor has seen the garden, tended it, and knows that from death springs life.

effects.description: Ability: "Prune the Garden"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity decreases with each kill made by the unit.

effects.description: Ability: "Regrow the Garden"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.localised_description: When Bonewrack infects a victim, their bones are warped in all directions. The progression crushes internal organs, twisting the victimâ€™s body, making them unable to move or defend themselves.

effects.description: Ability: "Brain Fever"

skillTree.localised_description: Victims of this plague become uncertain shambling husks, lost to the world in a sea of self-loathing and pity, stripped of any defenses they might have.

effects.description: Ability: "Black Rot"

skillTree.localised_description: A strange plague, it first excites the blood and them destroys it. Victims fight in a flurry of momentum, but quickly fade until they are little more than a shattered husk.

effects.description: Ability: "Red Plague"

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: This rusted mace oozes pus and slime and drips with Nurgle's choicest plagues and bears a dark enchantment that ensnares the souls of those crushed beneath its filth-encrusted mass. The captured soul is bound to the weapon, and can be seen writhing in eternal agony. The screams of these spirits are deafening and fearsome in equal measure, but they are as nothing compared to the terror caused when a fresh soul is bound to the mace, fuelling an epidemic growth of new disease: the wails turn into phlegm-choked laughter and the steady drip of pestilence becomes a weeping flood.

effects.description: Ability: "Filth Mace"

skillTree.localised_description: Infected with a seed of Nurgle's great being, the victims of this toxic miasma become a minor part of the god.

effects.description: Ability: "Vomit of Nurgle"

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates automatically when conditions are met

skillTree.localised_description: Those bearing the mark of Nurgle exude a sickening miasma wherever they go.

effects.description: Ability: "Locus of Virulence"

skillTree.localised_description: How exactly does one injure further the decayed, rotting flesh of the Urfather's servants?

effects.description:
Nurgle Authority: +1
	(Lord's army)
Hit points: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: The armies of Nurgle find strength in decay, bolstered by their own festering wounds.

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)
Passive ability: "Paragon of Decay"

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.localised_description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
